author: Nautical plays

author: Dumble King
comment: Sometimes I find myself in a similar situation with Houtarou, I may not be a detective or in highschool, nor will anything happen as mysterious and thrilling as what happened in his highschool, but during the time when I start middle school, I decided to just lay back, let the winds of fate decide my life. If fate and destiny are set to stone, then why would one have to work so hard? It's already predetermined.   Until I met a classmate who approached me during lunch, _she_ only just introduced herself and nothing much. Nothing much happened during that year and the year after but what I did note, is how willingly she was to approach such a cold person like me. This year, my third year in middle school, our seats were next to each other so we chatted a lot, and really, I'm just surprised how willing she was to interact with me. Sometimes I find her acting like Chitanda, though she may not be an honorary student/smart student but she asks a lot of questions starting with Why, this only ever applies to science and math though. She got me to socialize more with others and change me a bit. She even has the ability to drink beer or alcoholic beverages despite being the size of a gnome, just like that one time when Chitanda got drunk.  There was a time when I asked her Why did you approach me? All she said is I just want to keep you company, even if you don't know I'm there. I find it oddly warming but at the same time a bit creepy, it felt like was being stalked. After all, she made it obvious that she likes me as a friend, and in fine with it, I don't dare to jump into this emotional mess so early adding on with the fact I don't even what I feels like.  Is it coincidental that her first name is Angeline? (I find that she acts like Taiga from Toradora but with personalities of Chitanda sometimes.)
I watch  romance animes becuz ill never get a real one:)

author: Jung Hopie
comment: Does anyone want to know Why the Anime is called Hyouka? I will explain: Hyouka in Japanese means ice cream in English. In a pun, it will become “I scream” And the Hyouka series is associated with the classic literature club so the Anime's name is Hyouka. (Classic Literature Club is a club where the main characters join and learn the mysteries together)
